manifest.ext.name: Scrape-LE
manifest.ext.description: Lightweight Web Scrapeability Checker - Verify page reachability, capture titles, take screenshots, and detect anti-scraping measures
manifest.command.check-url.title: Check URL Scrapeability
manifest.command.check-selection.title: Check Selected URL
manifest.command.setup.title: Setup Browser
manifest.command.settings.title: Open Settings
manifest.command.export.title: Export Last Results
manifest.settings.title: Scrape-LE Settings
manifest.settings.screenshot.enabled.des: Enable automatic screenshot capture for each URL check
manifest.settings.screenshot.path.desc: Directory path to save screenshots, relative to workspace root
manifest.settings.screenshot.format.desc: Screenshot image format (PNG for lossless, JPEG for smaller file size)
manifest.settings.screenshot.format.opti: PNG - Lossless compression, larger file size
JPEG - Lossy compression, smaller file size
manifest.settings.screenshot.quality.des: JPEG quality (0-100, only applies when format is JPEG, higher is better quality)
manifest.settings.browser.user-agent.des: Custom User-Agent string for browser requests (leave empty for default Chromium user agent)
manifest.settings.check-console-errors.d: Capture and report JavaScript console errors from the page
manifest.settings.notifications.level.de: Controls the verbosity level of VS Code notifications
manifest.settings.statusbar.enabled.desc: Show Scrape-LE status bar entry in VS Code
manifest.settings.detections.antibot.des: Detect anti-bot protection systems (Cloudflare, reCAPTCHA, hCaptcha, DataDome, Perimeter81)
manifest.settings.detections.ratelimit.d: Detect and parse HTTP rate limiting headers (X-RateLimit-*, RateLimit-*, Retry-After)
manifest.settings.detections.robotstxt.d: Fetch and parse robots.txt file to check crawling permissions and policies
manifest.settings.detections.authenticat: Detect authentication walls and login requirements (401/403 status, login forms, auth keywords)
manifest.capability.untrusted-workspaces: Limited functionality in untrusted workspaces for security
